main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering over the Fairfield, Illinois airport on August 6, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as round, 50 to 75 feet in diameter, and a dull metallic gray color.,The object hovered silently for approximately 15 minutes before accelerating rapidly.,Weather conditions were clear with good visibility during the sighting.,No other witnesses were reported for the incident.,The incident has been logged into Project Blue Book for further investigation.
witness description: the subject who observed the UFO
